title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Charter Canal Boat Rides
body: Private Canal Boat Tours         The National Park Service will make your next special event a memorable one.Â  NPS Photo  Are you looking for a new and exciting way to celebrate that special event in your life? The Chesapeake and Ohio Canal offers private boat rides for birthday parties, retirement parties, weddings, etc..   Food and non-alcoholic beverages are allowed. Special request charter trips may be available. To place a specific need or request please call Great Falls Tavern Visitor Center. Canal boat rentals for a one hour private charter trip is $770.00. Canal boat capacity is 60 people. Trips are subject to availability.  Private tours are not offered in place of regularly scheduled public rides.
